posts.name: Jamie Kyle
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.83.0-beta.1. If youre interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • Handful of bug fixes to keep your app running smoothly. More exciting changes on the horizon!

Commit changes: Comparing v7.82.0-beta.1v7.83.0-beta.1 路 signalapp/Signal-Desktop 路 GitHub

link_counts.title: Comparing v7.82.0-beta.1...v7.83.0-beta.1 路 signalapp/Signal-Desktop 路 GitHub

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.83.0-beta.1

58 new commits since 7.82.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.83.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Remove "Paste & match style" on plain text inputs [2]

  • Fix missing string [3]

  • Remove references to missing .svg files [4]

  • Optimize getUnreadByConversationAndMarkRead [5]

  • Update behavior for soon-to-expire attachments on backup CDN [6]

  • Fix zoom reset on app init by removing preferred size handler [7]

  • Media Gallery improvements [8]

  • Init PinnedMessagesPanel [9]

  • More Media Gallery fixes [10]

  • PinnedMessagesPanel: Add footer with Unpin all messages button [11]

  • Add UI for more message types in PinnedMessagesBar [12]

  • Drop recipient without any identifier [13]

  • Add call summary support for all calls [14]

  • Drop invalid keyChange messages on export [15]

  • Only fetch CDN object metadata for remote backups [16]

  • Trim body on export if body attachment remains [17]

  • Further tweaks for media gallery [18]

  • Improvements to plaintext export [19]

  • Improve DOE behavior for poll messages [20]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.60.4 [21]

  • Init Call Quality Survey UI [22]

  • Fix lint in AxoDialog [23]

  • Upgrade electron to 39.2.4 [24]

  • Use separate user data dir for AppImage builds [25]

  • Fix use of Date.now() in test [26]

  • Disable consecutive audio playback in Media Gallery [27]

  • Fix layout issues in MediaGallery [28]

  • Fix grid scaling in media gallery [29]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.60.5 [30]

  • Interact with Windows notifications from a thread [31]

  • Fix loading more audio in media gallery [32]

  • release notes [33]

  • Update strings [34]

  • Update DNS fallback [35]

  • Add receive support for pin/unpin message [36]

  • Simplify getUnreadReactionsAndMarkRead query [37]

  • Improve handling of group story replies [38]

  • Update toast behavior for backup attachments [39]

  • Improve ordering of getRecentStoryReplies [40]

  • Improve scroll behavior when pressing enter from search input [41]

  • Simplify URL handling [42]

  • Improve message content cleanup behavior [43]

  • Remove most emoji is valid assertions [44]

  • Init local state for remote megaphones [45]

  • Update tabs UI in MediaGallery [46]

  • Update to ringrtc v2.60.7 [47]

  • Fix logging when cleaning up megaphone files [48]

  • Add regression test for mute consistency [49]

  • Improve reliability of keyboard shortcuts for composer [50]

  • Clarify purpose of getAndResetMaxAudioLevel [51]

  • Avoid persisting DOE message in first pass [52]

  • Clean up callMessages_test [53]

  • Support sending pin/unpin messages [54]

  • Setup pin/unpin actions and mark messages pinned in timeline [55]

  • Update release notes [56]

  • Update strings [57]

  • 7.83.0-beta.1 [58]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.82.0-beta.1v7.83.0-beta.1
